document_data.name: Hall of Five Arches
document_data.location: [[Moorland Ride]], [[Ravens Bluff/Sixstar|Sixstar]] [[Ravens Bluff/Uptown District|Uptown District]], [[Ravens Bluff]]
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Hall of Five Arches''', also referred to as the '''Tall Hall''' to its enormous size, was the guildhall of the [[Builders' Guild (Ravens Bluff)|Builders' Guild]] in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]].

{{Quote|''[Looks like] a building struggling to free itself of a bad case of stone warts.|A random Ravenian citizen expressing their distaste for the Tall Hall's profuse bas carvings.}}
document_data.Location: This building was located along [[Moorland Ride]], in the [[Ravens Bluff/Sixstar|Sixstar]] neighborhood of the city's [[Ravens Bluff/Uptown District|Uptown District]].
document_data.Structure: This large building stood a full six stories tall Its overall architectural style was what those on some worlds would refer to as [[wikipedia:Baroque architecture|baroque]].{{Cite organized play/LC/False Prophecy|22}}
document_data.Interior: The massive entrance to the building was met with a large array of high buttressed arches{{Cite organized play/LC/False Prophecy|23}}
